job.title: Software engineer in Intel oneMKL
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongThe Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library oneMKL team is looking for a software development engineer to work in the exciting area of Systems Programming and design This includes the development and maintenance of global Intel oneMKL library solutions portable across various operating systems and hardware as well as the development of new features for Intel and Intelcompatible architectures The primary job function is to design develop and validate high performance mathematical software additionally you may work directly with companies developing compilers operating systems and other software technologies and customers optimizing oneMKL software usagebrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongYou must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position Preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidates Experience listed below would be obtained through a combination of your schoolworkclassesresearch andor relevant previous job andor internship experiences This is an entry level position and would be compensated accordinglybrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongYou must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position Experience listed below would be obtained through a combination of your schoolwork classes research andor relevant previous job andor internship experiencesbrulliBachelor degree with 3 or more years or Masters with 6 months of experience or PhD in Computer Science or Computer engineering or Electrical Engineering or information technology or Mathematics or Physics or Computational science or aerospace engineering or mechanical engineeringbrliul6 months of experience with the following skillsbrulliNumerical analysis or scientific software design and developmentliliDevelopment in C Fortran or C languagesliliParallel programming technologies such as OpenMP TBB or MPIliliLinux Windows or Mac OS development brliulstronguExperience WithbrbrustrongPreferred QualificationsbrulliData structuresalgorithmsliliComputer architecture specific code optimizationsliliUsing mathematics software librariesliliIntel software development toolsliliExperience of optimizations for CPUs or GPUs brliulstrongInside this Business GroupbrbrstrongIntel Architecture Graphics and Software IAGS brings Intels technical strategy to life We have embraced the new reality of competing at a product and solution levelnot just a transistor one We take pride in reshaping the status quo and thinking exponentially to achieve whats never been done before Weve also built a culture of continuous learning and persistent leadership that provides opportunities to practice until perfection and filter ambitious ideas into executionbrbrstrongPosting StatementbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion religious creed sex national origin ancestry age physical or mental disability medical condition genetic information military and veteran status marital status pregnancy gender gender expression gender identity sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by local law regulation or ordinancebrbr
